ClickOnDoor.Hero: Oh my god, she's so weird...

EdWalkUpAri.Hero: Is it legal to distribute sadness to people somewhere? Why are you so sad?.. Did something happen to you?
I'm pretty ordinary. Worked all day.
Is it legal to distribute gladness to people somewhere?
Despite the weather, I am in a great mood today!
Sometimes I like to sit on the street in the evening and read a book, but today I read a little. I closed the book and saw you immediately.
And, to be honest, I have never seen such a gray cloudlet before.
Please stop being sad, look what I have!
